name: Trapped No Escape
description:
Trapped No Escape - An Immersive 3D Puzzle Adventure

Jen and Tom had been exploring some ancient ruins but had become separated. Jen had been wandering around for hours, calling Tom's name, when she came across this deserted house. She looks up at Tom and smiles but knows that look in his eyes. Fear.

“Jen, listen to me. I'm trapped. The door to this room is locked. You need to get me out of here!”

Jen knows that for Tom to be inside the house, there must be not only a way in, but also a way out. She takes a drink from her water bottle, a deep breath and walks towards the front steps...

Join the adventure in Trapped No Escape. A point and tap immersive 3D adventure game!

• Tap Jen to control her movements.
• Free roam anywhere in the jungle/house environment
• Tap objects to interact and solve the mysteries of this old abandoned house.
• Immersive 3D environments you can interact and discover
• Haunting soundtrack

PLEASE NOTE: Compatible with iPad 2 and up, iPad mini, iPod Touch 5 and up and iPhone 4S and up – SLOW PERFORMANCE ON EARLIER DEVICES
